channel.title: How do i change these? im beginner

item.title: How do i change these? im beginner
item.dc:creator: @bigbaddrag bigbaddrag
item.description:
@bigbaddrag wrote:

For the background image, look in the client files and look for image files, find the picture thatâ€™s on the background, right click it, and choose edit. take note of the image size (pixels) now, you can erase that pic and copy/paste the picture you want in the background onto the file, then resize it to match the size of the pic that was there before. now just save and you should be done.
ALSO, do not rename the file, i guess the client finds the pic by the name, because i renamed the pic file once and it messed it up.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change these? im beginner

item.title: How do i change these? im beginner
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

ok,
first of: the title on your client:

go into your client files
then go into your client
then to change it
hit ctrl+F and search for corby.
then you will see: corby xevolution made by -valentino
just change that name.

but if i were you i would go into client files and search for corby
then change all names.
do the same with in your source.
go into client then change all names.
then save and compile :]

i need to eat dinner but ill show you how to change background after.

Read full topic
